definition: two/both/some/a few/tael, unit of weight equal to 50 grams (modern) or 1⁄16 of a catty 斤[jin1] (old)
one side/other/different/lateral component of a Chinese character (such as 刂[dao1], 亻[ren2] etc)

sentences.english: There are flowers between the trees along the road .
sentences.chinese: 沿路两旁的树木之间都种着花草。

sentences.english: Its pale rays fled out on either hand; beautiful but grim was the vision they disclosed.
sentences.chinese: 微弱的光线向两旁流泻而出，照出的景象美丽而阴森。

sentences.english: The quiet streets stretched out on either side like the arms of a skeleton.
sentences.chinese: 静静的街道从两旁伸出来，像骷髅伸着枯臂。

sentences.english: High willows ranged along the highway.
sentences.chinese: 高大的柳树排列在公路两旁。

sentences.english: On either side the river lie Long fields of barley and of rye.
sentences.chinese: 绵长的大麦与黑麦田伸延在河岸两旁。

sentences.english: The noise which mke by crs disturbs residents living on both side of the street ll dy nd ll night.
sentences.chinese: 它所产生的噪音使街道两旁的住民日夜不得安宁。

sentences.english: Thousands of people lined the processional mute.
sentences.chinese: 成千上万的人站在列队行进路线的两旁。

sentences.english: On both sides of the seat were armrests , with a lion standing beside each of them.
sentences.chinese: 宝座两旁有扶手，靠近扶手有两个狮子站立。

sentences.english: The poles are to be inserted into the rings so they will be on two sides of the altar when it is carried.
sentences.chinese: 这贡要穿在坛两旁的环子内，用以抬坛。

sentences.english: Slide access notebook compartment is lined in faux fur for optimum protection.
sentences.chinese: 幻灯片访问笔记本车厢两旁是人造毛皮最佳的保护。

sentences.english: Erect poplars lined both sides of the road.
sentences.chinese: 道路两旁笔直的白杨排成行。

sentences.english: Elliptically both sides armrest, more facilitating activity.
sentences.chinese: 省略两旁扶手，更便于活动。

sentences.english: Quite an intimating hole not just long but also with big trees on both sides of the fairway.
sentences.chinese: 几吓人的球洞，码数长之外，球道两旁都系大树。

sentences.english: Boulevard, tree-lined, paths on both sides of flowers numerous and leafy.
sentences.chinese: 大道两旁绿树成荫，小道两边花繁叶茂。

sentences.english: There are trees beside the road.
The path is landscaped with willows along its two sides.
sentences.chinese: 小路两旁柳树成行，景色宜人。

definition: a narrow street (lined with walls)/to line the street
